fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.architectures

Class CoupledHIOA_Descriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.CoupledModelDescriptor
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.architectures.CoupledHIOA_Descriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelDescriptorI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RTCoupledHIOA_Descriptor

    public class CoupledHIOA_Descriptor
extends CoupledModelDescriptor
    The class CoupledHIOA_Descriptor describes coupled HIOA in model architectures, associating their URI, their static information, as well as a factory that can be used to instantiate a coupled HIOA object to run simulations.

    Description

    TODO

    Glass-box Invariants

     // for every imported variables v, v is not a re-exported variable of the
 // current model and for all sink variable s to which v is connected, s
 // identifies a submode of the current model and the type of s is compatible
 // with the type of v
 invariant       importedVars.keySet().stream().allMatch(vd -> !reexportedVars.values().contains(vd) && Stream.of(importedVars.get(vd)).allMatch(sink -> submodelURIs.contains(sink.sinkModelURI) && sink.importedVariableType.isAssignableFrom(vd.getType())))
 // for every re-exported variable v, the model re-exporting v is a submodel
 // of the current model, v is not an imported variable of the current model
 // and the type of the variable re-exported by the submodel is compatible with the type of v
 invariant       reexportedVars.keySet().stream().allMatch(vs -> submodelURIs.contains(vs.exportingModelURI) && !importedVars.keySet().contains(reexportedVars.get(vs)) && reexportedVars.get(vs).getType().isAssignableFrom(vs.type))
 // for every bindings between a source variable v and a set of sink variables
 // ss, v is exported by a submodel of the current model, all of the sink
 // variables s in ss are imported by submodels of the current model and the
 // type of s is compatible with the type of v
 invariant       bindings.entrySet().stream().allMatch(e -> submodelURIs.contains(e.getKey().exportingModelURI) && Stream.of(e.getValue()).allMatch(sink -> submodelURIs.contains(sink.sinkModelURI) && sink.importedVariableType.isAssignableFrom(e.getKey().type)))

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant.

      • CoupledHIOA_Descriptor

        public CoupledHIOA_Descriptor(java.lang.Class<? extends CoupledModelI> modelClass,
                              java.lang.String modelURI,
                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> submodelURIs,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends EventI>,EventSink[]> imported,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends EventI>,ReexportedEvent> reexported,
                              java.util.Map<EventSource,EventSink[]> connections,
                              CoupledModelFactoryI cmFactory,
                              java.util.Map<StaticVariableDescriptor,VariableSink[]> importedVars,
                              java.util.Map<VariableSource,StaticVariableDescriptor> reexportedVars,
                              java.util.Map<VariableSource,VariableSink[]> bindings)
        create a new coupled HIOA creation descriptor.

        Contract

         pre     modelClass != null || cmFactory != null
 pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     submodelURIs != null && submodelURIs.size() > 1
 pre     submodelURIs.stream().allMatch(t -> t != null && !t.isEmpty())
 pre     imported == null || imported.values().stream().allMatch(ess -> Stream.of(ess).allMatch(es -> submodelURIs.contains(es.importingModelURI)))
 pre     reexported == null || reexported.values().stream().allMatch(re -> submodelURIs.contains(re.exportingModelURI))
 pre     connections == null || connections.keySet().stream().allMatch(es -> submodelURIs.contains(es.exportingModelURI))
 pre     connections == null || connections.values().stream().allMatch(ess -> Stream.of(ess).allMatch(es -> submodelURIs.contains(es.importingModelURI)))
 pre     connections == null || connections.entrySet().stream().allMatch(e -> Stream.of(e.getValue()).allMatch(es -> es.sourceEventType.isAssignableFrom(e.getKey().sinkEventType)))
 pre     importedVars == null || importedVars.keySet().stream().allMatch(vd -> !reexportedVars.values().contains(vd) && Stream.of(importedVars.get(vd)).allMatch(sink -> submodelURIs.contains(sink.sinkModelURI) && sink.importedVariableType.isAssignableFrom(vd.getType())))
 pre     reexportedVars == null || reexportedVars.keySet().stream().allMatch(vs -> submodelURIs.contains(vs.exportingModelURI) && !importedVars.keySet().contains(reexportedVars.get(vs)) && reexportedVars.get(vs).getType().isAssignableFrom(vs.type))
 pre     bindings == null || bindings.entrySet().stream().allMatch(e -> submodelURIs.contains(e.getKey().exportingModelURI) && Stream.of(e.getValue()).allMatch(sink -> submodelURIs.contains(sink.sinkModelURI) && sink.importedVariableType.isAssignableFrom(e.getKey().type)))
 post  true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelClass - class defining the coupled model.
        modelURI - URI of the coupled model to be created.
        submodelURIs - URIs of the submodels of the coupled model.
        imported - map from imported event types to the submodels importing them.
        reexported - map from event types exported by submodels to exported event types exported by the coupled model.
        connections - connections between event types exported by submodels to event types imported by other submodels.
        cmFactory - coupled HIOA factory allowing to create the coupled model or null if none.
        importedVars - map from variables imported by this coupled HIOA and the submodels consuming them.
        reexportedVars - map from variables exported by this coupled HIOA and the submodels producing them.
        bindings - map between variables exported by submodels to ones imported by others.

      • CoupledHIOA_Descriptor

        public CoupledHIOA_Descriptor(java.lang.Class<? extends CoupledModelI> modelClass,
                              java.lang.String modelURI,
                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> submodelURIs,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends EventI>,EventSink[]> imported,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends EventI>,ReexportedEvent> reexported,
                              java.util.Map<EventSource,EventSink[]> connections,
                              CoupledModelFactoryI cmFactory,
                              java.util.Map<StaticVariableDescriptor,VariableSink[]> importedVars,
                              java.util.Map<VariableSource,StaticVariableDescriptor> reexportedVars,
                              java.util.Map<VariableSource,VariableSink[]> bindings,
                              HIOA_Composer hioa_mc)
        create a new coupled HIOA creation descriptor.

        Contract

         pre     modelClass != null || cmFactory != null
 pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     submodelURIs != null && submodelURIs.size() > 1
 pre     submodelURIs.stream().allMatch(t -> t != null && !t.isEmpty())
 pre     imported == null || imported.values().stream().allMatch(ess -> Stream.of(ess).allMatch(es -> submodelURIs.contains(es.importingModelURI)))
 pre     reexported == null || reexported.values().stream().allMatch(re -> submodelURIs.contains(re.exportingModelURI))
 pre     connections == null || connections.keySet().stream().allMatch(es -> submodelURIs.contains(es.exportingModelURI))
 pre     connections == null || connections.values().stream().allMatch(ess -> Stream.of(ess).allMatch(es -> submodelURIs.contains(es.importingModelURI)))
 pre     connections == null || connections.entrySet().stream().allMatch(e -> Stream.of(e.getValue()).allMatch(es -> es.sourceEventType.isAssignableFrom(e.getKey().sinkEventType)))
 pre     importedVars == null || importedVars.keySet().stream().allMatch(vd -> !reexportedVars.values().contains(vd) && Stream.of(importedVars.get(vd)).allMatch(sink -> submodelURIs.contains(sink.sinkModelURI) && sink.importedVariableType.isAssignableFrom(vd.getType())))
 pre     reexportedVars == null || reexportedVars.keySet().stream().allMatch(vs -> submodelURIs.contains(vs.exportingModelURI) && !importedVars.keySet().contains(reexportedVars.get(vs)) && reexportedVars.get(vs).getType().isAssignableFrom(vs.type))
 pre     bindings == null || bindings.entrySet().stream().allMatch(e -> submodelURIs.contains(e.getKey().exportingModelURI) && Stream.of(e.getValue()).allMatch(sink -> submodelURIs.contains(sink.sinkModelURI) && sink.importedVariableType.isAssignableFrom(e.getKey().type)))
 pre     hioa_mc != null
 post  true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelClass - class defining the coupled model.
        modelURI - URI of the coupled model to be created.
        submodelURIs - URIs of the submodels of the coupled model.
        imported - map from imported event types to the submodels importing them.
        reexported - map from event types exported by submodels to exported event types exported by the coupled model.
        connections - connections between event types exported by submodels to event types imported by other submodels.
        cmFactory - coupled HIOA factory allowing to create the coupled model or null if none.
        importedVars - map from variables imported by this coupled HIOA and the submodels consuming them.
        reexportedVars - map from variables exported by this coupled HIOA and the submodels producing them.
        bindings - map between variables exported by submodels to ones imported by others.
        hioa_mc - model composer to be used.

      • checkArchitecturalConsistency

        public boolean checkArchitecturalConsistency(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AbstractAtomicModelDescriptor> atomicModelDescriptors,
                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CoupledModelDescriptor> coupledModelDescriptors)
        check both the architectural consistency of the coupled HIOA in the context of a complete architecture i.e., when the information about submodels are known.

        Description

        This method implementation checks the following conditions on the variables bindings point of view:

        1. Every imported variable of the coupled model is connected to existing submodels with compatible types:

          importedVars.entrySet().stream().allMatch( e -> Stream.of(e.getValue()).allMatch( source -> submodelURIs.contains(source.sinkModelURI) && source.importedVariableType.isAssignableFrom( e.getKey().getType()) && CoupledHIOA_Descriptor.isImportingVar( source.sinkModelURI, new StaticVariableDescriptor( source.sinkVariableName, source.sinkVariableType, VariableVisibility.IMPORTED), atomicModelDescriptors, coupledModelDescriptors)))

        2. Every variable reexported by this coupled model is exported by an existing submodel:

          reexportedVars.keySet().stream().allMatch( source -> CoupledHIOA_Descriptor.isExportingVar( source.exportingModelURI, new StaticVariableDescriptor( source.name, source.type, VariableVisibility.EXPORTED), atomicModelDescriptors, coupledModelDescriptors))

        3. Every binding have a source variable exported by a submodel and sink variables imported by submodels and their types are compatible:

          bindings.keySet().stream().allMatch( source -> CoupledHIOA_Descriptor.isExportingVar( source.exportingModelURI, new StaticVariableDescriptor( source.name, source.type, VariableVisibility.EXPORTED), atomicModelDescriptors, coupledModelDescriptors) && Stream.of(this.bindings.get(source)).allMatch( sink -> CoupledHIOA_Descriptor.isImportingVar( sink.sinkModelURI, new StaticVariableDescriptor( sink.sinkVariableName, sink.sinkVariableType, VariableVisibility.IMPORTED), atomicModelDescriptors, coupledModelDescriptors)))

        The overridden method, called inside this method, checks the architectural consistency from the point of view of events exchanges.

        Contract

         pre     atomicModelDescriptors != null
 pre     coupledModelDescriptors != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Overrides:
        checkArchitecturalConsistency in class CoupledModelDescriptor
        Parameters:
        atomicModelDescriptors - descriptors of the atomic models including the ones that are submodels.
        coupledModelDescriptors - descriptors of the coupled models including the ones that are submodels.
        Returns:
        true if the descriptor satisfies the consistency constraints.

      • isImportingVar

        protected static boolean isImportingVar(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                        StaticVariableDescriptor vd,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AbstractAtomicModelDescriptor> atomicModelDescriptors,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CoupledModelDescriptor> coupledModelDescriptors)
        return true if the model is importing the variable.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     vd != null
 pre     atomicModelDescriptors != null
 pre     atomicModelDescriptors.containsKey(modelURI) || coupledModelDescriptors != null && coupledModelDescriptors.containsKey(modelURI)
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the model to be tested.
        vd - variable descriptor to be tested.
        atomicModelDescriptors - the set of atomic model descriptors.
        coupledModelDescriptors - the set of coupled model descriptors.
        Returns:
        true if the model is importing the variable.

      • isExportingVar

        protected static boolean isExportingVar(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                        StaticVariableDescriptor vd,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AbstractAtomicModelDescriptor> atomicModelDescriptors,
                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CoupledModelDescriptor> coupledModelDescriptors)
        return true if the model is exporting the variable.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     vd != null
 pre     atomicModelDescriptors != null
 pre     atomicModelDescriptors.containsKey(modelURI) || coupledModelDescriptors != null && coupledModelDescriptors.containsKey(modelURI)
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the model to be tested.
        vd - variable descriptor to be tested.
        atomicModelDescriptors - the set of atomic model descriptors.
        coupledModelDescriptors - the set of coupled model descriptors.
        Returns:
        true if the model is exporting the variable.
